info.name: Discordama EX
info.description:
/!\ Please note that is an early access version and does not represent the final form of Discordama EX. For quicker and further development, all suggestions and feedback are welcome and can be done by sending a DM to one of us. (@Aligator#9999 or @Ag#5896)
Expect bugs, unfinished and not-yet started features.

Experience the wonderful Discord layout in KoGaMa! (Name is a working title)
    Design inspired by Discord
    - https://www.discordapp.com/
    Upgraded version of Discordama [V.2]
    - https://userstyles.org/styles/166699/discordama-v-2
    Style for KoGaMa
    - https://www.kogama.com/
    - https://friends.kogama.com/
    - https://kogama.com.br/
info.additionalInfo:
[7/15/19] (v.1.0) [EARLY ACCESS] -- First public release
[8/21/19] (v.1.1) -- Chat update
[9/5/19] (v.1.2) -- Feed update
[6/11/20) (v.2.0) -- Big update fixing a lot of bugs and adding new features. Not stable.
